wikipedia_page.main: Harry Edward Grant (born 31 December 1993) is an English footballer who plays for Southern League Division One Central side Thatcham Town , where he plays as a midfielder.

response: His cousins, Paul Allen, Bradley Allen and Clive Allen, were also footballers, as was his uncle Les Allen. His father, Dennis, played for Reading, Charlton Athletic and Bournemouth & Boscombe Athletic. His son Charlie Allen played under his management at several clubs and now plays for Farnborough. His nephew Harry Grant played professionally, and Harry's brother Freddie trained with Oxford United's youth team before being released by the club.
*Harry Grant (rugby league) (born 1998), Australian rugby league player
